metadata.funder: This project has received funding from the Instituto de Salud Carlos III under grant agreement (PI19/00154; PI19/00306; PI19/00381; PI19/00056; PI 20/00783). The project also received a research grant from Instituto de Salud Carlos III, Ministry of Science and Innovation (Spain), awarded on thecall for the creation of Health Outcomes-Oriented Cooperative Research Networks (RICORS), with reference RD21/0016/0016, co-funded with European Union – NextGenerationEU funds.

cohort.name: CONCEPT-DM2
cohort.inclusion_criteria: patients that, at 01/01/2017 or during the follow-up from 01/01/2017 to 31/12/2022 had active health card (active TIS - tarjeta sanitaria activa) and code of type 2 diabetes (T2D, DM2 in spanish) in the clinical records of primary care
cohort.exclusion_criteria: patients with no contact with the health system from 01/01/2017  to 31/12/2022

variables.label: area_id
variables.description: Pseudonymized area to which the patient belongs

variables.label: health_profesional_id
variables.description: Pseudonymized health profesional to which the patient is assigned

variables.label: month_nac
variables.description: Birth date of the patient, only month and year

variables.label: avg_income
variables.description: The annual mean income of the census tract in euros

variables.label: education
variables.description: Educational attainment of the patient divided in 4 categories

variables.label: country
variables.description: Country of origin of the patient

variables.label: nursing_home_baseline
variables.description: Does the patient live in a nursing_home at baseline?

variables.label: nursing_home_followup
variables.description: Does the patient live in a nursing home at followup?

variables.label: nursing_home_date_followup
variables.description: Since when does the patient live in a nursing_home?

variables.label: death
variables.description: Vital status of the patient in two categories

variables.label: death_code1
variables.description: Main cause of death: Primary Death code

variables.label: death_code2
variables.description: Death with multiple causes: Second Death code

variables.label: death_code3
variables.description: Death with multiple causes: Third Death code

variables.label: death_code4
variables.description: Death with multiple causes: forth Death code

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: ID of the patient to whom the measurement corresponds

variables.label: param_name
variables.description: Name of the parameter or variable being measured (LDL, etc.)

variables.label: param_value
variables.description: Value taken by the parameter for that patient's measurement

variables.label: param_date
variables.description: Date on which this parameter is measured

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: ID of the patient to whom the measurement corresponds

variables.label: param_cat_value
variables.description: Value taken by the parameter for that patient's measurement

variables.label: param_cat_name
variables.description: Name of the parameter or variable being measured

variables.label: param_cat_date
variables.description: Date on which this parameter is measured

variables.label: comorb_codif
variables.description: Disease classification system the code is refered to

variables.label: comorb_date_ini
variables.description: Date when the disease was diagnosed

variables.label: comorb_date_end
variables.description: Date when the disease was healed (if applicable)

variables.label: consult_request_service
variables.description: Indicates the service for which a consult_request_service was conducted

variables.label: visit_derivation_PC
variables.description: Indicates if the visit is a derivation from PC

variables.label: consult_request
variables.description: Indicates if in the visit the profesional conducted a consultation request (interconsulta)

variables.label: test_value
variables.description: Test results of the test conducted in test_name

variables.label: test_date
variables.description: Date when the test was conducted

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: Identifier of the patient who is receiving the treatment

variables.label: atc_code
variables.description: ATC (Anatomical, Therapeutic, Chemical classification system) treatment code
